title: AWT tests broken with JDK 18 EA
body:
### Describe the bug

See https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/runs/4464602503?check_suite_focus=true

You can get the Raw logs with the small gear at the right then `View raw logs` then wait a long time for them to load.

Then look for `quarkus-integration-test-awt`.

As there are also some errors in the log when running them locally but not errors breaking the tests, I'm not sure which one breaks the tests.

@Karm could you have a look?

The workflow running this is there: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/.github/workflows/jdk-early-access-build.yml#L9

Note that it's using Zulu as Temurin was not available at the time. Maybe it is now and maybe that's the issue. I have no idea.


Output from the tests run:
